channel.title: IoC on harre.dev
channel.description: Recent content in IoC on harre.dev

item.title: Getting started with Inversion of Control
item.description: Alright, lets dive straight into the deep end! … ok, but not drown in the process of doing so. One step at a time. Lets’s start with an example. The technical side Here is some code: public class Foo { private readonly Bar bar; public Foo() { this.bar = new Bar(); } } To create an instance of Foo we write Foo theFoo = new Foo(); In this example we have two classes, Foo and Bar.
